page.title: 17QUESTIONAIRE - RESULTS 5
page.content: {SECTION 5 : GRANDPARENTS' EMPLOYMENT {************************************ 1.Grandparents in full time employment { Grandad 100% Grandma 94% 2.Grandparents in part time employment { Grandad 0% Grandma 6% 3.Grandparents unemployed ? {Grandad 0% Grandma 0% 4.Where did Grandad go to work ? {Crawshawbooth 50% Rossendale 33% {Burnley 11% Bury/Manchester 6% 5.Where did Grandma go to work ? {Crawshawbooth 58% Rossendale 42% {Burnley 0% Bury/Manchester 0% 6.How did Grandad travel to work ? {Car 28% Bus 33% Walk 39% Other 0% 7.How did Grandma travel to work ? {Car 0% Bus 50% Walk 50% Other 0% 8.Job types:-{Plumber,Printer,Weaver, {Slipper worker,Clog maker,Tackler, {Cotton mill worker,Textile printer, {Fireman,Driver,Farmer,Shop assistant.
